title: IIT Mandi start-up uses green tech to convert steel mills waste into useable products - Economic Times
content: IIT Mandi start-up uses green tech to convert steel mills waste into useable products  Economic Times
description: According to officials, the team uses clean combustion techniques to trim the waste into a metal with high iron content which can then be reused by industries like ship building, stone crushing plants, oil and gas plants and power plants.
